metadata.name: Terminal Service Process Spawn
metadata.comment: Detects a process spawned by the terminal service server process (this could be an indicator for an exploitation of CVE-2019-0708)

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND contains(lower(process.parent_process.cmd_line), lower('\\svchost.exe')) AND contains(lower(process.parent_process.cmd_line), lower('termsvcs')) AND NOT (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\rdpclip.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower(':\\windows\\system32\\csrss.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower(':\\windows\\system32\\wininit.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower(':\\windows\\system32\\winlogon.exe')) OR process.name is null))

output.summary: Detects a process spawned by the terminal service server process (this could be an indicator for an exploitation of CVE-2019-0708)
